name: Astra Software Ltd
tagline: Reliable technical executor for meaningful startup
description:
Astra. Software is a Canadian software solution provider. We turn meaningful startup ideas into reliable working software in transparent development process.
Astra.Software’s approach is to closely collaborative with our clients.
Communication is the most important part of our development process, because our software must firstly support the interests of our client. We work using Agile methodologies and our project mangers ale located in Canada.
Our developers are highly skilled professionals located in various locations and time zones, so they can work on our clients' projects day and night.
If you are not sure which factors you should consider when choosing software solution provider we recommend reading a post on our blog: "5 factors you should consider when looking for a software development company".
